chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams base_params
pb_params: PrimaryBackupParams base_params

Goal:
forall (A : Type) (out : list PB_output), no_output_at_backup_trace [(Primary, inr out)]

Premises:
Record PrimaryBackupParams (base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_PrimaryBackupParams { input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_PrimaryBackupParams _ _%function_scope
Inductive name : Set := Primary : name | Backup : name
Inductive PB_output : Type := RequestResponse : input -> output -> PB_output | ReadResponse : data -> PB_output
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
no_output_at_backup_trace = fun (A : Type) (tr : list (name * (A + list PB_output))) => forall x : name * (A + list PB_output), In x tr -> no_output_at_backup x : forall A : Type, list (name * (A + list PB_output)) -> Prop Arguments no_output_at_backup_trace {A}%type_scope _%list_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments
StepFailure_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
StepFailureDiskOp_input : forall (h : do_name) (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), ~ In h failed ->...-> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
NOABT_app : forall (A : Type) (xs ys : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace xs -> no_output_at_backup_trace ys -> no_output_at_backup_trace (xs ++ ys)
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed ->...-> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
NOABT_tail : forall (A : Type) (x : name * (A + list PB_output)) (y : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace (x :: y) -> no_output_at_backup_trace y
NOABT_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : name * (A + list PB_output)) (y : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup x -> no_output_at_backup_trace y -> no_output_at_backup_trace (x :: y)
NOABT_contra : forall (A : Type) (l : list PB_output) (tr : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace ((Backup, inr l) :: tr) -> l = [] \/ (exists d : data, l = [ReadResponse d])
NOABT_singleton_inr_nil : forall (A : Type) (h : name), no_output_at_backup_trace [(h, inr [])]
StepFailureDiskOp_deliver : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [(do_pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : Net.name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y} where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?NameOverlayParams : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?P]
NOABT_singleton_inr_read_response : forall (A : Type) (h : name) (d : data), no_output_at_backup_trace [(h, inr [ReadResponse d])]
do_name_eq_dec : forall x y : do_name, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?rel : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
NOABT_head : forall (A : Type) (x : name * (A + list PB_output)) (y : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace (x :: y) -> no_output_at_backup x
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_network -> list Net.name * ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_network -> list Net.name * ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_sind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list Net.name * ordered_dynamic_network ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list Net.name * ordered_dynamic_network ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_disk_ops_sind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_failure_disk_ops_ind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
no_output_at_backup = fun (A : Type) (x : name * (A + list PB_output)) => forall y : list PB_output, snd x = inr y -> fst x = Primary \/ match y with | [] | [ReadResponse _] => True | _ => False end : forall A : Type, name * (A + list PB_output) -> Prop Arguments no_output_at_backup {A}%type_scope
outputs_m_revert_trace : forall tr : list (name * (input + list PB_output)), no_output_at_backup_trace tr -> outputs_m tr = outputs_1 (revert_trace tr)
